question: Weird stomach painssssssssssssss?
question_content: So I drank one beer and I had this HUGE stomach pain, and lately I really haven't been feeling myself at all, one second I'm hot the next I'm freezing. Also one minute I"m mad the next i'm sad i'm all mixed up is this anything anyone has experienced ?? Do you think I could be pregnant?

answers.answer_content: With you feeling hot and then freezing,  did you have a fever?  If so, then maybe you have an infection :S  or the flu.  Should get it checked out and also check out if you are pregnant.  Hope you feel better.
it might just be your period
